title: Analyze Provider Performance
description: A medical director wants to compare the performance of different primary care providers on key quality measures.

tasks.expected_outcome: The director accesses the analytics for provider-level reporting.

tasks.description: Select several key quality measures (e.g., HBP control, A1c control, cancer screening).
tasks.expected_outcome: The director chooses the measures they want to compare.

tasks.description: Generate a report that shows each provider's performance rate for the selected measures, benchmarked against the clinic average.
tasks.expected_outcome: The report allows the director to identify high-performing providers and those who may need additional support or training.
